meanings.definition: A cloth headband worn by soldiers to protect the head from the sun.
meanings.sent1: The soldier tied the pugarees around his head to shield his face from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She bought a colorful pugarees to match her uniform.
meanings.sent3: The pugarees flew off in the wind, making the soldier chase after it comically.
meanings.sent4: The pugarees was like a loyal companion, always there to guard against the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pugarees stood out vividly against the army green attire.

meanings.definition: A piece of cloth worn around the neck for protection or decoration.
meanings.sent1: He wrapped the pugarees around his neck to keep warm in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent2: The elegant pugarees added a touch of style to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The pugarees doubled as a makeshift napkin during the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her pugarees was a shield against the cold, much like a cozy hug.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the pugarees felt comforting against her skin.
